Package wellen

Class BeatMIDI

java.lang.Object
wellen.BeatMIDI
All Implemented Interfaces:
MidiInListener
public class BeatMIDI
extends java.lang.Object
implements MidiInListener
similar to Beat except that beat events are triggered by an external MIDI CLOCK signal.
